```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(skimr)
```

# Import Data

```{r}
nhanes <- read_csv("nhanes.csv")
```

# Data Analysis



```{r}
physically_active_education <- nhanes %>% 
  group_by(education) %>% 
  summarize(days_active = mean(phys_active_days, na.rm = T)) %>% 
  drop_na(education)

physically_active_education
```


# Data Visualization


## Basic Bar Chart

```{r}
ggplot(physically_active_education, aes(x = education,
                                        y = days_active)) +
  geom_col() + 
  coord_flip()
```

## Reordered Bar Chart

```{r}
ggplot(physically_active_education, aes(x = reorder(education, days_active),
                                        y = days_active)) +
  geom_col() + 
  coord_flip()
```

## Add Color

```{r}
ggplot(physically_active_education, aes(x = reorder(education, days_active),
                                        y = days_active,
                                        fill = education)) +
  geom_col() + 
  coord_flip() 
```




# Facets

```{r}
physically_active_education_working <- nhanes %>% 
  group_by(gender, work) %>% 
  summarize(days_active = mean(phys_active_days, na.rm = T)) %>% 
  drop_na(work)

physically_active_education_working
```

```{r}
ggplot(physically_active_education_working, aes(x = education,
                                               y = days_active,
                                               fill = education)) +
  geom_col() + 
  coord_flip() +
  facet_wrap(~work)
  
```



# Themes

```{r}
library(ggthemes)


ggplot(physically_active_education_working, aes(x = work,
                                               y = days_active,
                                               fill = work)) +
  geom_col() + 
  coord_flip() +
  facet_wrap(~gender) +
  theme_fivethirtyeight() +
  scale_fill_fivethirtyeight()
  



```
